title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, August 4 2014
description: First up, Chester Wisniewski, senior advisor at the online security firm Sophos, on the Black Hat security conference happening this week in Las Vegas. Then, Adriene Hill joins us from a student data conference looking at the uses of collected student information.
